questions.question: この地域では、近年（＿）災害が頻発している。
questions.hint:
自然しぜん (shizen): nature
災害さいがい (saigai): disaster

explanation.correct:
✅ Correct! 自然しぜん (shizen) means 'natural.' Natural disasters are commonly reported in the news, especially related to weather or earthquakes.

  • 自然しぜん (shizen): natural
  • 人為じんい (jin'i): artificial, man-made
  • 技術ぎじゅつ (gijutsu): technology
  • 都市とし (toshi): city

Sentence meaning: In this region, natural disasters have been occurring frequently in recent years.
explanation.incorrect:
❌ Incorrect. The correct answer is 自然しぜん (shizen).

  • 自然しぜん: natural
  • 人為じんい: artificial
  • 技術ぎじゅつ: technology
  • 都市とし: city
